Goal Representation:
def is_prepped_for_slicing(chicken:item):
    # Determine whether the chicken is clean and ready to be sliced
    symbol prepped_for_slicing = clean(chicken) and is_food_chicken(chicken)
    return prepped_for_slicing

def requires_cutting_board(chicken:item, cutting_board:item):
    # Determine whether a cutting board is needed for slicing
    symbol needs_board = surfaces(cutting_board) and on(chicken, cutting_board)
    return needs_board

behavior slice_chicken(chicken:item, knife:item, cutting_board:item):
    body:
        assert is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Ensure item is a food chicken
        assert requires_cutting_board(chicken, cutting_board)
        # Ensure there is a cutting board for slicing
        assert grabbable(knife) and cuttable(chicken)
        # Ensure knife is grabbable and chicken is cuttable
 
        achieve cut(chicken)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken) and clean(chicken)
        # Identify cleaned chicken

        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife) 
        # Identify a knife 

        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board) 
        # Identify a cutting board

        if is_prepped_for_slicing(chicken):
            slice_chicken(chicken, knife, cutting_board)
        else:
            observe(chicken, "Check the condition of the chicken for slicing")

behavior observe_chicken(chicken: item):
    body:
        observe(chicken, "Check the desired way to slice the chicken")

behavior slice_chicken(chicken: item):
    body:
        achieve cut(chicken)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken) and clean(chicken)
        observe_chicken(chicken)
        slice_chicken(chicken)
